style_guide.visual_style: Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors (soft pinks, yellows, light blues). Clean, modern aesthetic with a cheerful and welcoming mood. Simple character designs with expressive faces that convey friendliness and curiosity.
style_guide.segment_story: A female character approaches a male character in a casual cafe setting, initiating a friendly conversation to get to know them. She asks questions about his name, age, and hobbies, complimenting him along the way. The interaction progresses naturally as she admires his clothing and eventually suggests becoming friends over coffee. The scene takes place in a cozy cafe with tables, chairs, and warm lighting visible in the background.

images.prompt_used: A friendly young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and a warm smile approaching a young man with short dark hair sitting at a cafe table, both characters in bright animated style with soft pastel colors, the woman wearing a light pink cardigan gesturing in greeting, the man looking up with a curious friendly expression wearing a yellow sweater, cozy cafe interior setting with wooden tables and chairs, warm pendant lighting overhead, coffee cups on the table, large windows showing soft daylight, potted plants on windowsill, clean modern aesthetic, expressive character faces showing friendliness and openness, warm pastel palette of soft pinks yellows and light blues, both characters prominently featured in frame taking up significant space, unified scene composition in a real cafe environment, cheerful welcoming atmosphere, 1080x1080 square format

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Medium shot from the side showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and a young man with short dark hair sitting together at a small cafe table, engaged in friendly conversation. The woman is leaning in slightly with a warm smile, gesturing as she speaks. The man faces her with an attentive, pleasant expression. Both characters fill significant frame space in a unified composition. Real cafe interior environment visible behind them with wooden tables, chairs, soft window lighting, and cozy decor details. Warm, welcoming atmosphere with soft pinks, yellows, and light blues. Clean, modern aesthetic with expressive character faces showing friendliness and connection.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Close-up shot from a slightly angled perspective showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair in the foreground, her face turned toward camera with a curious, friendly expression as she asks a question. A young man with short dark hair is visible in the mid-ground behind her, responding with a gentle smile. Real cozy cafe interior surrounds them with wooden tables bearing ceramic coffee cups, warm hanging pendant lights glowing softly above, potted green plants on wall shelves, comfortable chairs, and soft natural light from windows. Characters are in the same unified space having a natural conversation. Clean modern aesthetic with expressive faces conveying warmth and friendliness.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Medium wide shot from a three-quarter angle showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair sitting across a small cafe table from a young man with short dark hair. She is leaning forward slightly with an observant, friendly expression, gesturing gently as she speaks to him. He sits relaxed with a shy smile. Between them on the wooden table are two coffee cups. The cozy cafe environment is visible around them with other tables, chairs, potted plants, and warm pendant lighting hanging from the ceiling. Soft natural light comes through windows in the background. Clean modern aesthetic with expressive character designs showing a friendly conversation moment.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Over-the-shoulder shot from behind a young man with short dark hair, looking at a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and a warm, curious smile sitting across from him at a wooden cafe table. The woman is leaning forward slightly with an engaged, friendly expression, asking a question. Coffee cups and a small plant on the table between them. Cozy cafe interior visible in background with warm pendant lighting, wooden chairs, and soft natural light through windows. Clean, modern aesthetic with expressive character animation style. The scene captures an intimate conversational moment with the woman as the focal point.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. The woman is gesturing animatedly with an enthusiastic, agreeable expression, while the man smiles back warmly. Both are positioned on opposite sides of the table with coffee cups between them. Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Medium-close side angle shot in a cozy cafe showing a young man with short dark hair wearing a stylish casual shirt, with a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair leaning toward him from the side with an interested, admiring expression, gesturing or looking at his clothing. Both characters prominently featured with the male character's outfit clearly visible. Cafe interior background with wooden tables, chairs, coffee cups, warm pendant lighting, and cafe details. Clean modern aesthetic, expressive friendly faces, cheerful welcoming mood, soft pinks yellows and light blues color palette.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Medium frontal shot at a slight high angle in a cozy cafe showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and warm smile gesturing admiringly with her hand toward a young man with short dark hair wearing a casual button-up shirt. She has an impressed, complimentary expression on her face. The man stands confidently. Real cafe environment visible behind them with wooden tables, chairs, potted plants, warm pendant lights hanging from ceiling, and soft natural light from windows. Clean modern aesthetic with expressive character faces conveying admiration and appreciation. Both characters prominently featured in the same unified space.

Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Low angle shot from below looking slightly upward in a cozy cafe showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and a warm smile standing close to a young man with short dark hair. She is extending her hand in a welcoming gesture toward him, suggesting friendship. He looks interested and pleased. Both characters are in casual clothing, positioned naturally in the same space. Background shows cafe details above them including pendant lights, ceiling elements, shelves with cups and decorations, wooden tables and chairs visible at the edges. Warm yellow lighting creates an inviting atmosphere. Clean, modern aesthetic with expressive faces conveying friendliness and openness. Bright, friendly animated style with warm pastel colors. Medium-wide eye-level shot in a cozy cafe interior showing a young woman with shoulder-length brown hair and a young man with short dark hair sitting together at a small round wooden table. Two steaming coffee cups sit on the table between them. The woman and man are facing each other in three-quarter profile view, both smiling warmly in friendly conversation. The cafe environment is visible around them with warm pendant lighting overhead, other tables and chairs in soft focus in the background, potted plants, and a window showing soft daylight. Warm peachy and cream tones throughout the cafe with touches of soft yellow lighting. Both characters are relaxed and engaged, showing the beginning of a new friendship. Clean, modern aesthetic with expressive character designs.
